root.name: Asphalt: Urban GT 2
root.description: OverviewAsphalt: Urban GT 2 is a racing game developed by Gameloft and originally appearing on S60 mobile phones (such as the N-Gage) prior to being ported to the Nintendo DS and Sony PSP. It has six game modes, 30 tracks, and 36 vehicles in addition to music from Moby and in-game appearances by The Pussycat Dolls.
